com.revature.Services

Interface ManageAudiPayments

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManageAudiCarPayments

    public interface ManageAudiPayments
    A customer car payment management service

    The ManageAudiPayments interface provides a method that allows an employee user to view all the customer car payments in the AWS RDS database.

    The ManageAudiPayments interface provides a method that allows a customer to make a payment on an Audi car.

    The ManageAudiPayments interface provides a method that allows a customer to view the information on every car they own - including the customer's payment history pertaining to each car.

    The ManageAudiPayments interface provides a method that prints all the car payments made by a particular customer.

    The ManageAudiPayments interface provides a method that gets and prints a customer's total car balance

    Author:
    josecanela

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createPayment(java.lang.Integer custId, java.lang.Integer carId, java.lang.Double paymentAmount)
      Creates a Payment object and inserts it's information into the RDS database utilizing JDBC - hence, making a payment on a car.
      void CustomerBalance(java.lang.String username)
      Gets and prints a customer's total car balance
      void customerPaymentHistory(java.lang.String username)
      Gets all the car payments that have been made by a particular customer and prints them
      void viewAllPayments()
      Gets all the customer car payments made on cars and prints them
      void viewAudiCarsAndPaymentInfo(java.lang.String username)
      Gets and prints information on all the cars a customer owns and the customer's payment history with respect to each car.

      • viewAllPayments

        void viewAllPayments()
        Gets all the customer car payments made on cars and prints them

      • createPayment

        void createPayment(java.lang.Integer custId,
                   java.lang.Integer carId,
                   java.lang.Double paymentAmount)
        Creates a Payment object and inserts it's information into the RDS database utilizing JDBC - hence, making a payment on a car.
        Parameters:
        custId - a customer's ID
        carId - the ID of the car that the customer is making a payment on
        paymentAmount - a customer's payment amount
